name: registry
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing registry cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`registry` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/masonyc/terraform-provider-registry).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing registry cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/masonyc/terraform-provider-registry)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-registry` repo](https://github.com/masonyc/pulumi-registry-bridge/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-registry` repo](https://github.com/masonyc/terraform-provider-registry/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the registry package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering RegistryResource resources.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by GetRegistryResource.
